author: wn.com
title: Education Department joins the world in celebrating teachers on World Teachers Day, 05 October 2015 ...
text: ( Source : Department of Basic Education - Republic of South Africa ) The 5th of October is World Teacher 's day, a day set aside to show appreciation to educators globally as well as to raise awareness and understanding on the work and value
